Package src.main.domain.controllers

Class DocumentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.main.domain.controllers.DocumentController
  • public class DocumentController
extends java.lang.Object
    DocumentController class is responsible for handling document-related actions such as creation, uploading, and deletion. It also implements the Singleton design pattern to ensure that only one instance of the controller exists at any given time.

      • getInstance

        public static DocumentController getInstance()
        Returns the single instance of the DocumentController. If the instance has not been created yet, it creates a new instance before returning it.

      • createDocument

        public void createDocument​(java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String author)
                    throws emptyAuthor,
                           alreadyExistsDoc
        Creates a new empty document with the given title and author.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the new document.
        author - The author of the new document.
        Throws:
        emptyAuthor - If the author is empty.
        alreadyExistsDoc - If a document with the same title and author already exists.

      • uploadDocument

        public void uploadDocument​(java.lang.String path)
                    throws ForbiddenExtension,
                           UnrecognisableFormatting,
                           FileDoesntExists,
                           emptyAuthor,
                           alreadyExistsDoc,
                           emptyTitle
        Uploads a document from the given file path.
        Parameters:
        path - the file path of the document to be uploaded.
        Throws:
        ForbiddenExtension - If the file extension is not recognized.
        UnrecognisableFormatting - If the formatting of the file is not recognized.
        FileDoesntExists - If the file does not exist at the given path.
        emptyAuthor - If the author of the document is empty.
        alreadyExistsDoc - If a document with the same title and author already exists.
        emptyTitle

      • deleteDocument

        public void deleteDocument​(java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String author)
                    throws notFoundDocument,
                           notFoundAuthor,
                           emptyTitle,
                           emptyAuthor
        Deletes the document with the given title and author.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the document to be deleted.
        author - The author of the document to be deleted.
        Throws:
        notFoundDocument - If the document with the given title and author does not exist.
        notFoundAuthor - If the author does not exist.
        emptyTitle - If the title is empty.
        emptyAuthor - If the author is empty.

      • downloadDocument

        public void downloadDocument​(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String author,
                             java.lang.String path)
                      throws FileAlreadyExists,
                             ForbiddenExtension
        Downloads the document with the given title and author to the specified file path.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the document to be downloaded.
        author - The author of the document to be downloaded.
        path - The file path to save the downloaded document.
        Throws:
        FileAlreadyExists - If a file already exists at the given path.
        ForbiddenExtension - If the file extension is not recognized.

      • getContent

        public java.lang.String getContent​(java.lang.String title,
                                   java.lang.String author)
                            throws notFoundDocument,
                                   notFoundAuthor,
                                   emptyTitle,
                                   emptyAuthor
        Returns the content of the document with the given title and author.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the document whose content will be returned.
        author - The author of the document whose content will be returned.
        Returns:
        The content of the document with the given title and author.
        Throws:
        notFoundDocument - If the document with the given title and author does not exist.
        notFoundAuthor - If the author does not exist in the system.
        emptyTitle - If the title is an empty string
        emptyAuthor - If the author is an empty string.
